title: Assigning beginless/endless range to `tsrange` column raises NoMethodError from v7.0.4
body:
### Steps to reproduce

This depends on PostgreSQL.

```ruby
require 'bundler/inline'

gemfile(true) do
  source 'https://rubygems.org'

  git_source(:github) { |repo| "https://github.com/#{repo}.git" }

  gem 'rails', github: 'rails/rails', branch: 'main'
  gem 'pg'
end

require 'active_record'
require 'minitest/autorun'
require 'logger'

ActiveRecord::Base.time_zone_aware_attributes = true
ActiveRecord::Base.time_zone_aware_types += %i[tsrange]

ActiveRecord::Base.establish_connection(adapter: 'postgresql', database: 'tmp')
ActiveRecord::Base.logger = Logger.new($stdout)

ActiveRecord::Schema.define do
  create_table :posts, force: true do |t|
    t.tsrange :tsrange
  end
end

class Post < ActiveRecord::Base
end

class BugTest < Minitest::Test
  def test_assign_beginless_range_to_tsrange
    post = Post.new

    post.tsrange = (..Time.now)
    post.tsrange # raises NoMethodError
  end

  def test_assign_endless_range_to_tsrange
    post = Post.new

    post.tsrange = (Time.now..)
    post.tsrange # raises NoMethodError
  end
end
```

### Expected behavior

Assigning beginless/endless range to `tsrange` column does not raise any errors.

### Actual behavior

```
NoMethodError: undefined method `in_time_zone' for nil:NilClass

               ^^^^^^^^^^^^^

    /Users/takahiro-miyoshi/.rbenv/versions/3.1.2/lib/ruby/3.1.0/delegate.rb:87:in `method_missing'
    /Users/takahiro-miyoshi/.rbenv/versions/3.1.2/lib/ruby/gems/3.1.0/bundler/gems/rails-36704bfbf871/activerecord/lib/active_record/attribute_methods/time_zone_conversion.rb:23:in `cast'
    /Users/takahiro-miyoshi/.rbenv/versions/3.1.2/lib/ruby/gems/3.1.0/bundler/gems/rails-36704bfbf871/activemodel/lib/active_model/attribute.rb:199:in `type_cast'
    /Users/takahiro-miyoshi/.rbenv/versions/3.1.2/lib/ruby/gems/3.1.0/bundler/gems/rails-36704bfbf871/activemodel/lib/active_model/attribute.rb:43:in `value'
    /Users/takahiro-miyoshi/.rbenv/versions/3.1.2/lib/ruby/gems/3.1.0/bundler/gems/rails-36704bfbf871/activemodel/lib/active_model/attribute_set.rb:51:in `fetch_value'
    /Users/takahiro-miyoshi/.rbenv/versions/3.1.2/lib/ruby/gems/3.1.0/bundler/gems/rails-36704bfbf871/activerecord/lib/active_record/attribute_methods/read.rb:38:in `_read_attribute'
    /Users/takahiro-miyoshi/.rbenv/versions/3.1.2/lib/ruby/gems/3.1.0/bundler/gems/rails-36704bfbf871/activemodel/lib/active_model/attribute_methods.rb:277:in `tsrange'
    tmp.rb:45:in `test_assign_endless_range_to_tsrange'
```

https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/45348 may cause this bug.

### System configuration

**Rails version**: 7.0.4, main

**Ruby version**: 3.1.2p20
